title: In the Land of Gods and Monsters, Part Two
description: Part two in the Gods and Monsters Series.  In the land of gods and monsters, she was set free. Left, lost, forgotten. Cast out of the only world she remembers, Pet now answers to a new nameâ€”victim. Ares walked away without a backward glance and left her desperate for safety, desire, and the freedom she found in his cruel touch. But in the end, Pet discovers nothing is ever free.  * In the Land of Gods and Monsters, Part Two, may contain triggers for some readers.
author: Carmen Jenner
